1376900.name: Making it Home Original Soundtrack
1376900.description:
The complete Making Home original videogame soundtrack by Jordan Rees and Paul Zervas.

7 orchestral country tracks to keep you rolling down the road until you make it home.

Soundtrack Composed and produced by Jordan Rees and Paul Zervas
Lyrics by Paul Zervas
Additional Arrangements by Thomas James White and Patrick Shanahan
Guitar and Vocals by Paul Zervas
Violin by Alleya Weibel
Flute by Imogen Llywelyn
Mastered by Meurig Hailstone at Reeltime Sound Services
